conversation.content: Good afternoon. I'm calling about unexpected charges on my account that weren't disclosed when I signed up last month.
I understand your concern. Let me pull up your account right away. May I have your account number or the phone number associated with your service?
The account number is listed as 4829-7163 on my statement.
Thank you. I have your account here, showing activation on October 12th with our Professional Plus plan at $89.99 monthly. I see additional charges totaling $47.82 that you're inquiring about.
Exactly. Those fees were never mentioned during the signup process or in the advertised pricing.

I apologize for the confusion regarding these charges. Let me review each fee in detail. There's a regulatory recovery fee of $12.95, a network access charge of $24.87, and a service activation fee of $10.00.
This is concerning. The website clearly showed $89.99 per month with no mention of additional fees.

I completely understand your frustration, and you're right to bring this to our attention. I'm reviewing your enrollment session from October 12th, reference number ENR-102023-8847, and I can see where the confusion occurred.
I'd appreciate understanding what went wrong and how we can resolve this.

Absolutely. The enrollment page you accessed through campaign code FALL2023 should have displayed all fees transparently. I can see there was a display error that prevented the fee disclosure from loading properly.
That's a significant oversight. What can be done about the charges already applied to my account?
Since this was our error, I'm authorized to issue a full credit for these fees. I'm processing a credit of $47.82 to your account right now, confirmation number CRD-4521-XK9.
I appreciate that. Will these fees appear on future bills?

The regulatory recovery fee of $12.95 and network access charge of $24.87 are recurring monthly charges. However, given this situation, I can offer you our transparent pricing plan at $127.81 total, which includes all fees with no surprises.
How does that compare to what I'm currently paying in total?
Currently, your total would be $137.81 with all fees included. The transparent plan saves you $10 monthly and locks in that rate for 24 months under guarantee code TPG-2024-1127.
That sounds reasonable. Can you send me the full terms in writing before I commit to the change?
Certainly. I'm sending the complete terms document to your email address on file right now. You'll receive it from service@company.com within the next five minutes, document reference DOC-8829-TPM.
Perfect. Once I review it, how do I confirm the plan change?

Simply reply to that email with your confirmation, or call our direct line at 800-555-0147 and reference case number CS-112024-4829. I've also noted everything in your account, so any representative can assist you with the transition.

scenario: complaining about hidden fees not disclosed at signup
